SubjectRegulations Amending the Property Assessment and Taxation (Railway Right-of-Way) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROPERTY ASSESSMENT AND TAXATION (RAILWAY RIGHT-OF-WAY) REGULATIONS in order to ensure consistency with a provincial regulation that was repealed and replaced with Railway Corporations Assessment Regulation, B.C. Reg. 51/2016.
